title: Patent Patrol: Shimano electronic suspension control automatically adjusts stroke
content:
Today’s Patent Patrol once again takes a close look at a Shimano invention. Shimano files more patents than perhaps any other company in the cycling industry. This time, they have filed a patent regarding an electronic suspension control that, according to patent language, will “improve the usability of the human-powered vehicle.” While Shimano damns with […]

The post Patent Patrol: Shimano electronic suspension control automatically adjusts stroke appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
